00028 OutdatedDataDeleter::OutdatedDataDeleter() {
00029         performAutomaticHistoryUpdates = true;
00030         minHistoryLength = 1;
00031 }
00032 
00033 OutdatedDataDeleter::~OutdatedDataDeleter() {
00034

00037 void OutdatedDataDeleter::visit(Node* node){
00038         //nothing to delete (yet)

00041 void OutdatedDataDeleter::visit(Group* node){
00042         //nothing to delete (yet)

00045 void OutdatedDataDeleter::visit(Transform* node){
00046 
00047         bool isStaticTransform = false;
00048         Attribute staticTransformTag("transformType","static");
00049         isStaticTransform = attributeListContainsAttribute(node->getAttributes(), staticTransformTag);
00050 
00051         if(!isStaticTransform) {
00052                 if (performAutomaticHistoryUpdates) {
00053                         /* optionally update history/cache */
00054                         node->deleteOutdatedTransforms(TimeStamp(timer.getCurrentTime()));
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 /* check if node is outdated */
00058                 if (node->getCurrentHistoryLenght() < minHistoryLength) {
00059                         doDeleteNode(node);
00060                 }
00061         }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 void OutdatedDataDeleter::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00066         //nothing to delete (yet)
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool OutdatedDataDeleter::getPerformAutomaticHistoryUpdates() const {
00070     return performAutomaticHistoryUpdates;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void OutdatedDataDeleter::setPerformAutomaticHistoryUpdates(bool performAutomaticHistoryUpdates) {
00074     this->performAutomaticHistoryUpdates = performAutomaticHistoryUpdates;
00075 }
00076 
00077 unsigned int OutdatedDataDeleter::getMinHistoryLength() const {
00078     return minHistoryLength;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void OutdatedDataDeleter::setMinHistoryLength(unsigned int minHistoryLength) {
00082     this->minHistoryLength = minHistoryLength;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void OutdatedDataDeleter::doDeleteNode(Node* node) {
00086                 /* delete _this_ from the graph by deleting all handles that the parents have */
00087                 if (node->getNumberOfParents() == 0) { // oops we are trying to delete the root node, but this one has no parents...
00088                         LOG(WARNING) << "OutdatedDataDeleter: The root node with ID " << node->getId() << " cannot be deleted.";
00089                         return;
00090                 }
00091                 LOG(DEBUG) << "Deleting Transform node with ID " << node->getId();
00092 
00093                 /*
00094                  * so we found the handle to the current node; now we will invoke
00095                  * the according delete function for every parent
00096                  */
00097                 while (node->getNumberOfParents() > 0) { //NOTE: node->getNumberOfParents() will decrease within every iteration...
00098                         unsigned int i = 0;
00099                         unsigned int childIndex = 0;
00100                         rsg::Node* parentNode;
00101                         parentNode = node->getParent(i);
00102                         Group* parentGroup =  dynamic_cast<Group*>(parentNode);
00103                         if (parentGroup != 0 ) {
00104                                 childIndex = parentGroup->getChildIndex(node);
00105                                 parentGroup->removeChildren(childIndex);
00106                         } else {
00107                                 assert(false); // actually parents need to be groups otherwise sth. really went wrong
00108                         }
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 /* delete/clean up all potential child references */
00112                 Group* nodeAsGroup;
00113                 nodeAsGroup = dynamic_cast<Group*>(node);
00114                 if (nodeAsGroup != 0) {
00115                         nodeAsGroup->removeChildren(0, nodeAsGroup->getNumberOfChildren());
00116                 }
00117 }
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 }
